title: pixel 5 black screen
content:
Hello, I just bought a Pixel 5 on May 4 and it arrive at my house on May 6, I started to use it and there is a delay when I change from lock to unlock like 3 second black screen. But today the
Phone has gone completely black and has not turn on I try holding the power button for 8 seconds to see if that will do something and I have tried to charge it for an hour and then turn it on and nothing has happened.
I will like to get it change by a new one or fix
